config.body:
Hi,
 
My name is Renu Parameswaran and my sjsu id is 011819574.This is an email to book an appointment during your office hours.
Let me know if there is any slot available
 
Thanks and Regards 
Renu Parameswaran
config.initialDisplayMessage:
I am Sara, The first of my name!!Enter which mode you have to enter
1: Chat Mode
2: Training Mode
3: Feedback Mode
4: Statistics Mode
5:Weather Mode 
Exit: Exit
config.chatResponse: Chat mode initiated. Enter your Question
config.trainingResponse1: Training mode initiated. Enter your Question
config.trainingResponse2: Enter your Answer for the Question
config.feedbackResponse1: Feedback mode initiated. Enter your Response ID
config.feedbackResponse2: Was the Answer given by Sara correct? Please enter Yes or No
config.feedbackResponseYes: Thanks for your Feedback!!Do you like to give more Feedback? Please type yes or no
config.weatherResponse: Weather Mode Initiated. I can give you weather for 3 places. What would you like to know?

config.twoQuestionsError: I can handle only one question right now. I will be more intelligent in next version. Sorry for incovenience.
config.noAppropriateResponseFound: Sorry I cannot find the appropriate answer for your question. Please remember I can answer only questions from the greensheet
